about_the_game:
• Discover high-tech hazards, threatening robots, and unlikely friends as you jump through countless floors of a secret laboratory stretching deep underground

  • Unlock up to 8 characters each with special abilities that help you complete levels faster

  • Find bonus levels between main stages that focus on a single character's unique traits

  • Play all levels on an endless loop with increasing difficulty and try to beat your best score

  • Watch the Swaplings learn to work together as they try to escape the lab and reach freedom
detailed_description:
• Discover high-tech hazards, threatening robots, and unlikely friends as you jump through countless floors of a secret laboratory stretching deep underground

  • Unlock up to 8 characters each with special abilities that help you complete levels faster

  • Find bonus levels between main stages that focus on a single character's unique traits

  • Play all levels on an endless loop with increasing difficulty and try to beat your best score

  • Watch the Swaplings learn to work together as they try to escape the lab and reach freedom
name: Swaplings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Swaplings is a tag-team platformer about eight genetic experiments working together to escape the depths of a secret underground laboratory. Use each character's special abilities to jump gaps, stomp robots, and smash platforms until you can reach the surface and find freedom.
